name: GetVTPassiveDNSRecords
description:
This automation takes the results of VirusTotal Passive DNS data enrichment, converts it into a table and displays it into a markdown field in the indicator layout. 
The automation is intended to be used with a button in the layout, to populate the results. The automation depends on VirusTotal (API v3) (Partner Contribution), which contains the command vt-passive-dns-data.
author: asantamarina
